Around the world, 2024

Tom Lynch
Oct 27, 2024

My partner Milla and I spent most of 2024 having a look around. We saw lots. We kept our friends and family updated with an occasional email which automatically published to our blog. Take a read!

I also gifted Milla a camera for her birthday just before the trip started, a Sony a6400. Her photography skills have multiplied and she's posted her best pics of our trip on her photography page.
